choices: You stumble, and fall flat on your face.
1.content:
Ugh... You hate mornings. Eyes stinging, you go through your morning ritual: making coffee, having shower, getting dressed. However, this won't be an ordinary day.

You work at the city council, and have been getting damned tired of going to work recently; a bunch of radical feminists have been picketing, with the occasional lapse into violence for the past week. Apparently, they're disgruntled that the council didn't impose a new law requiring all businesses of 20 employees or over to have an equal number of females to males.

Luckily no one knows that you were one of the main opponents of that proposed legislation. You're far from a sexist but, by your logic, if businesses are forced to employ an equal number of each sex then more likely than not, a skilled employee is going to be passed over due to an arbitrary an unnecessary law. If a business is discriminating on the other hand, that's of course a different story.

* * *


SHIT! The car isn't starting. Luckily you are usually first in to work, so you shouldn't be late. Besides, it saves petrol.

After the 40 minute journey you finally arrive. Odd... the feminists are especially eager today - outside at 8:15! You wonder how you're going to get into work this time; apparently some male employees have come under assault before - no serious injuries, but definitely not very pleasant.

After assessing the situation, you just decide to leg it - after all, though you may not look physically fit at first, you're a marathon runner and martial artist; getting past should be easy.

You start running, but then it happens,

"HEY! It's him! That's the main guy who was against the new equal employment law!"

Uh oh... somehow, they found out about you. This could get very ugly - you had already flanked half of the unprepared crowd, so there was no chance of going back in the other direction, you had to try and push on. You dodged a hand lashing out to grab you.

Looking up you saw a lot of very angry faces. If they caught you, they'd probably rip you apart!
1.title: Hell's beginning.

choices: Are in the dark, tightly squeezed, surrounded by a terrible smell.
Can see everything; but you'd much rather have stayed unconscious.
Are being pinned down by a terrible weight.
11.content:
You stumble to the side with a sharp pain in your ribs. One of them just kicked you! You realise that one of your options is now closed; there's no more flight, so you can either just give up, or try to fight back.

Being the kind of person that doesn't take shit from anybody if you feel you've been done an injustice (though paradoxically, you are somewhat a pacifist and will try to avoid conflict if possible), you decide to fight back.

"WHAT THE FUCK?! What the fuck is wrong with you stupid women?"

Their onslaught falters as you gather yourself up to fight.

"With retards like you, an equal employment law would be a fucking catastrophe! You're the God damn biggots, not me!"

All the women have stopped now, and you feel a bit of pride recovered as they flail for words.

It doesn't last long, however, as you feel a crushing blow on the back of your skull. Your vision darkens for a few seconds as you almost lose consciousness, but just manage to recover yourself. However, there's no relief as you feel a sharp kick to the stomach, before you begin getting beaten up all over.

Dazed, you feel yourself turned on your back, as this very tall woman, sits down on your neck, and begins bouncing up and down. It's only a few seconds before you really do lose consciousness.

When you wake up you...

"Hey!! He's awake!!!" she shouted to somebody close by that you obviously couldn't see. "Good morning, 'little man'. We were so offended by you stupid machoist claims that we decided to shrink you, not only that but we decided to toss you into this women's only portapotty."

As you process all that she's said the woman's face disappeared and was soon replaced with two spread out buttcheeks which were place completely over the hole.

"Now you'll know how women have felt putting up with men's shit all their lives."

Now what happens?

12.content:
Clambering up the stairs to the employee entrance, you feel a hand at your back. Not thinking, you swing your elbow back full force, causing the woman to stumble down the stairs knocking down her cohorts with her. That's probably what saved you.

You slam the door behind you and just manage to lock it before the women start banging on it from the outside. You breathe out, having been holding your breath during that ordeal.

Feeling a bit guilty at having elbowed a woman in the head, you go to call the police to tell them that the protest was just getting violent.

121.content:
You notice that the room seems to be getting bigger the closer you get to the phone. You shrug it off as you being in a daze still from the feminist ordeal, and focus instead on reaching the phone. However, once you are about 5 inches and have only made it to your armchair, you pinch yourself to make sure. This is all so surreal that instead of screaming, you pull yourself into the chair to think about what could have caused this. You don't have much time to think though as you hear a loud banging on the door you locked. The feminists brought a battering ram of sorts!

13.content:
Quickly dodging to the left, your ankle twists as your shoe oddly slips off. As you stumble, your foot gets caught on your trouser leg. Odd, because they were tailored specifically to your proportions - maybe you put on the wrong pair this morning.

As the women come barelling at you, you try and get back up. Stumbling around on your hands and knees, you keep on getting caught up in your clothes. You finally realise that there's no way you're going to get out of this now, so you lie on your back and raise your legs at the women defensively.

That's when you realise it. You look up at the towering women, as your body slowly diminishes in size. It's the closest thing you've ever experienced to pure terror: the women loom above you, they could easily kill you.

As you continue to diminish, the women's expressions also change. From pure range, they flicker with confusion as they all start skidding to halt. You look at their gigantic calves flexing as they slow down.

You look up at the army of women standing before you, looking between themselves, extremely confused as you continue to shrink.

info.description:
Alright, I'm guessing the title already started up conjuring images for some of you. Basically, what this story is about is you walking through the streets and seeing a feminazi gathering. By feminazi, I don't mean feminist, I mean the type of radical extreme man-hater that gives the feminist cause a bad name.

Now, through some way or another, these women aren't happy with you; maybe it's just their hate for men, or a stupid comment or two you said, but you're shrunk and they don't like you. Now, they're going to try and humiliate you; they're going to take out their misplaced anger - at how women have been oppressed throughout the ages - and you're going to bear the brunt.

Anything goes in this story APART from male giants. Even toilet is allowed (and encouraged?). Also, write coherently and reasonably long chapters, and you can try and keep the story going after you die, by a shift to the third-person and another character. Retarded chapters will be deleted.

Oh, and before I forget, try in most cases to keep at least one option that continues along the current line - e.g. he's being humiliated by feet, have an option that continues with his humiliation and another that changes it a bit. This is a loose rule, and will only really be enforced if you barely follow the option you're writing about just in order to change the storyline how you want.
